data.eml:eml: Pipunculidae (Diptera) from southern Iran, including two new species of the genus Tomosvaryella Aczél

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Majnon-Jahromi, Bahareh, Gheibi, Mehdi, Fallahzadeh, Majid, Kehlmaier, Christian, Hesami, Shahram (2017): Pipunculidae (Diptera) from southern Iran, including two new species of the genus Tomosvaryella Aczél. Zootaxa 4273 (4): 488-500, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4273.4.2
